title: Linux Kernel 6.5 Officially Released, This Is What’s New
description:
MIDI 2.0 support in ALSA, ACPI support for the RISC-V architecture, Landlock support for UML (User-Mode Linux), and much more.

The post Linux Kernel 6.5 Officially Released, This Is What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: GNOME 45’s Nautilus File Manager Gets a Modern Full-Height Sidebar Layout
description:
GNOME 45's Nautilus file manager received new "Search Everywhere" buttons to expand the search scope and a full-height sidebar layout in new beta release. Here's a first look!

The post GNOME 45’s Nautilus File Manager Gets a Modern Full-Height Sidebar Layout appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Mageia 9 Officially Released with Linux 6.4, Smaller Disk Footprint, and More
description:
Mageia 9 distribution is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.4 and featuring the latest KDE Plasma 5.27 LTS desktop environment. Here's what else is new!

The post Mageia 9 Officially Released with Linux 6.4, Smaller Disk Footprint, and More appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
